attributes.action: accept that we, the citizens of the UK are appalled by the recent mercenary actions of MPs!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The citizens and tax payers of the UK no longer believe that the majority of MPs in the House of Commons are prepared to put the interests of the citizens and the country before their OWN mercenary gain.
We request the right to make own feelings known through the ballot box by way of a general election within three calendar months.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
